00021 
00022 #include "terminal_utils.h"
00023 
00024 void ColourTerminal(unsigned char fg, unsigned char bg, unsigned char attr)
00025 {
00026 #ifdef WIN32
00027   HANDLE hConsole = GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
00028   SetConsoleTextAttribute(hConsole, fg | (bg<<4) | attr);
00029 #else
00030   //printf("%c[%d;%d;%dm", 0x1B, attr, fg + 30, bg + 40); 
00031   printf("\033[%d;%dm", attr, fg + 30); 
00032   fflush(stdout);
00033 #endif
00034 }
00035 
00036 void ResetTerminal()
00037 {
00038 #ifdef WIN32
00039   ColourTerminal(TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_WHITE);
00040 #else
00041   printf("\033[0m");
00042 #endif
00043 }
00044 
00045 void TerminalInformation(const char* text)
00046 {
00047   ColourTerminal(TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_BLUE, TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_BLACK, TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_ATTR_BRIGHT);
00048   printf("%s\n",text);
00049   ResetTerminal();
00050 }
00051 
00052 void TerminalAlert(const char* text)
00053 {
00054   ColourTerminal(TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_GREEN, TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_BLACK, TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_ATTR_BRIGHT);
00055   printf("%s\n",text);
00056   ResetTerminal();
00057 }
00058 
00059 void TerminalWarning(const char* text)
00060 {
00061   ColourTerminal(TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_RED, TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_BLACK, TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_ATTR_BRIGHT);
00062   printf("%s\n",text);
00063   ResetTerminal();
00064 }
